location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from George Forster Saldlier [Sadlier] to Sir Evan Nepean, Baronet, President and Governor in Council, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is reporting on the outcome of a conference held between Captain Sadlier, Mahmed Agha, Captain Agasa and the Kashife of Al-Ahsa. It informs the Governor of Bombay that as a result of this conference, Sadlier has been assured that he will reach Ibrahim Pasha's camp prior to his departure, and that he has to means to ensure he is able to communicate with India. It notes that he has not obtained any further information on the views of Ibrahim Pasha [Ibrāhim Pāshā].
